{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = EnGenius EUB-362 EXT.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = 108Mbit USB-Desktop Adapter |caption2 = |pp = |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = EnGenius_EUB-362_EXT |wikipedia = |brand = EnGenius |model = EUB-362 |submodelappend = yes |submodel = EXT |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |sernum = |wlclass = G108 |series = |if = USB |if_bus_version = 2.0 |ifconnector = Female Mini-B |formfactor = corded (modular) adapter |vendor_id = 0cf3 |device_id = 0002 |subvendor_id = |subdevice_id = |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = NI3-UB36005001 |icid = |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = 00:02:6F |chip1 = Atheros;AR5523; |chip2 = Atheros;AR2112; |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = RP-SMA |antenna = |txchains = |rxchains = |sstreams = |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b/g |802.11g = 108 |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = No |manuf = Senao |manuf_model = NUB-362 |manuf_rev = EXT |addchip = 2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Anadigics;AWL6153;;1; |flags = high power |802dot11_protocols = bg |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 10/26/2005 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = 655216003026 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B000CSQVJ4 |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = Taiwan |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== [https://deviwiki.com/files/datasheets/senao/EUB-362-EXT.pdf Datasheet] "NUB-862-1.00" and "701605460000" appears to be silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. ===Additional specifications=== This information is per '''Senao''''s datasheet for the device. '''Transmit Power (typical)'''
802.11b, 1-11Mbps, 22 dBm
802.11g, 6-24Mbps, 22 dBm
802.11g, 36Mbps, 21 dBm
802.11g, 48Mbps, 20 dBm
802.11g, 54Mbps, 19 dBm {{802dot11 RxSens|11b |1M=-96 |11M=-91 }} {{802dot11 RxSens|11g |6M=-91 |54M=-76 }} [[Category:English Documentation]]
